Package estuary.model

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GameFunctionality
    GameFunctionality is an interface that contains all methods that are necessary for each game This includes all button presses and clicks.
    Movable
    Interface to make sure all movable entities implement move
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Animation
    Used to handle the images for entities
    Barrier
    A barrier is an entity that prevents other entities from moving through a location
    CountingTutorial
    A version of counting game that is made to teach the player how to play
    Entity
    Entity is super class for all objects within the game.
    FinalScreen
    Game type for displaying the user's final score
    Game
    Game is an abstract class that implements Tickable and GameFunctionality All games extend Game to make sure that they contain all necessary methods
    HorseshoeCrab
    Horseshoe Crabs are moving entities that the user must click on to count them.
    KelpPlant
    A KelpPlant is an object for the maze game.
    MainMenu
    Game type for the initial splash screen
    MazeCrab
    The MazeCrab is the entity that the user controls.
    MazeTutorial
    Creates a specific maze game designed to teach the user how to play
    Model
    The Model contains all the data and logic for each subgame of our Estuary game.
    ModelCountingGame
    This is the second game.
    ModelMazeGame
    The player completes the game by moving the mazeCrab to the estuary point.
    ModelShoreGame
    Contains all of the game logic for the Shore Game
    ModelTesting
    Calls to all tests to make sure game runs properly
    MovingEntity
    Abstract class that contains all methods that movable entities need
    Oyster
    An oyster is an entity that the user can collect to create Oyster Gabions
    OysterGabion
    An Oyster Gabion is created by the user once 5 oysters are collected.
    Predator
    A predator is an entity that will cause the mazeCrab to lose health when a collision occurs between them
    Rectangle
    This is the Rectangle class, which is used to provide hitboxes for Entities.
    Rock
    Rocks get in the way of horseshoe crabs and make it harder to find horseshoe crabs
    SeaWall
    A seawall is made by the shoreCrab and prevents waves from hitting the shore.
    Shore
    A shore is an entity that loses health when a wave collides with it.
    ShoreCrab
    A shoreCrab is the entity that the player controls.
    ShoreThreat
    A shorethreat moves across the top of the screen and generates waves when lined up with shore entities Whether a wave is generated or not is based on the threat's power
    ShoreTutorial
    This is a version of ShoreGame that is made to teach the player how to play the game
    Vector2
    A vector is a geometric object that has a magnitude (or length) and a direction.
    Wave
    A wave is generated by a shore threat.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CountingTip
    Enums for each tip in the Counting Tutorial
    EstuaryOrientation
    Enum for the different orientations the estuary can be at
    GAME_ENUM
    Enums for each different type of game the model can have
    MazeTip
    Enum for every tip in the maze tutorial
    ShoreTip
    Enum for every tip in the Shore tutorial
